deck

Class DeckEle

  • java.lang.Object
    • deck.DeckEle

  • public class DeckEle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the link from which the kind of linkeList class Deck @see Deck aremade of. Each DeckEle contains: _ a question @see Question _ a previous and a next DeckEle @see DeckEle which can be null It contains method useful in setting next and previous elements, checking if those elements exists. It contains mehtods to set and get the question contained by this object.
    Author:

      • getNext

        public DeckEle getNext()
        Gives the next deckElement. Be careful, it might return null!
        Returns:
        the next DeckElement.

      • setNext

        public void setNext(DeckEle deckEle)
        Sets the next deckElement. It also sets the previous element of the next one to this. If parameter is null, it will set the next to null without trying to change to this the next element (null)
        Parameters:
        deckEle - the next DeckElement

      • setPrevious

        public void setPrevious(DeckEle deckEle)
        Sets the previous element. It also sets the next element of the previous one to this. If parameter is null, it will set the previous to null.
        Parameters:
        deckEle - the previous DeckElement

      • getQuestion

        public Question getQuestion()
        Gives the question contained by the DeckElement
        Returns:
        the question

      • getPrevious

        public DeckEle getPrevious()
        Gives the previous element. Careful, it will return null if no previous element was initialised.
        Returns:
